path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Iosiro-Synthetix Grants DAO v2 Smart Contract Audit.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Iosiro-Synthetix Grants DAO v2 Smart Contract Audit/snx-grants-dao-v2

findings.title: Possible to overwrite states
findings.description: When creating a grant, initiative or competition, the mapping was not validated to determine whether the hash was currently empty, allowing overwriting of existing entries by creating a new instance with the same hash.
